Actions.Name: Axe Kick
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage to bloodied foes.
Actions.Charge: Gains range 2 and may dash 2 before using this ability.

Actions.Name: Roppo
Actions.Description: The [name] takes a pose and gains the following interrupt until the start of their next turn.

Interrupts.Name: Roppo
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe uses an ability in range 2, and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: The [name] may dash 2, then deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Hurl Boulder
Actions.Description: A foe in range takes 2 damage, is dazed, and is shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Izuna Drop
Actions.Description: The [name] takes a pose, then ends their turn and gains
Actions.Delay: Their next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, they may dash 2. Then, if a foe is adjacent the [name] grabs them, removing both of them from the battlefield, then placing both of them back in free space adjacent to each other in range 2. The foe must save. On a successful save, they take [fray] damage and are dazed. On a failed save, they are stunned and take 2[D]+[fray].
